ygData.subject: Re: Summon Element Scroll
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/28/99 6:54:28 AM Eastern Daylight Time, benh@zip.com.au ... MOB s. ... Is it also maybee a mistake in the wording of the spell book?  I
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/28/99 6:54:28 AM Eastern Daylight Time, benh@...
writes:

> P.S. This thread started as a whats a 'Summon Element Scroll'. I have since
> found out that quite a few people have found just this as a drop from
MOB's.
> Some of them said where, and i've sort of concluded that any MOB that drops
> components could drop this scroll. I guess they are just damn rare!!

Is it also maybee a mistake in the wording of the spell book? I have a "Word
of Element" scroll in my bank vault (As far as I know none of my spells use
it). I am a Necromancer, so I do not know if that is what you need... just
mentioning it.

Sonoroud Tomebinder.
